item.title: Binance will list BFUSD and launch a BFUSD Zero Fee Promotion.
item.description: On August 13th, as per official information, Binance is set to launch BFUSD on August 13th, 2025, at 22:00 (GMT + 8) and commence trading for the BFUSD/USDT pair. Furthermore, a zero fee promotion will be applicable for both BFUSD spot and margin trading pairs.

item.title: Binance Alpha will launch PublicAI (PUBLIC) on August 15th. Eligible users can use Alpha Points to claim the airdrop.
item.description: August 13th. According to official channels, Binance Alpha is set to become the inaugural platform to list PublicAI (PUBLIC) on August 15th. Once Alpha trading commences, eligible users can access the Alpha event page to receive an airdrop by utilizing Alpha Points. Further details will be disclosed at a later time.

item.title: Trader Eugene: ETH Could Hit an All-Time High Within 3 Days
item.description: August 13th. Trader Eugene Ng Ah Sio posted on his personal channel, "It seems that ETH is likely to break through the $4800 all-time high within 3 days."

item.title: Shitcoin Season Index Rises to 35
item.description: On August 13th, according to the data from Coinmarketcap, the Altcoin Season Index has rebounded to 35. It had dropped to 29 on August 11th. This index shows that among the top 100 cryptocurrencies by market capitalization, approximately 35 projects have outperformed Bitcoin in terms of price growth over the past 90 days.Note: The CMC Altcoin Season Index is a real-time indicator utilized to evaluate whether the cryptocurrency market is currently in an altcoin-dominated season. This index is based on the performance of the top 100 altcoins in relation to Bitcoin over the past 90 days.

item.title: Solana-Based Meme Coin WORTHLESS Surpasses $20 Million Market Cap, Hits All-Time High
item.description: On August 13th, according to GMGN data, the Meme coin WORTHLESS based on Solana surged by more than 48% in the past 24 hours. Its market capitalization exceeded $20 million and reached a historical high of $20.32 million, with a 24-hour trading volume of $2.8 million.The Worthless Coin (WORTHLESS) is named based on its core positioning of "worthlessness". This token is characterized by "lacking utility and value" and aims to satirize the seriousness and over-commitment of certain projects in the cryptocurrency market.BlockBeats reminds users that Meme coins often lack practical use cases and show high price volatility. Therefore, investment should be approached with caution.

item.title: With Ethereum surpassing $4600, two long whales are each realizing a floating profit of over $24 million
item.description: On August 13th, as monitored by Onchain Lens, with Ethereum breaking through $4600, two whales reaped significant profits from their long positions.Whale 1: It held a position worth $123 million and had a 25-times leverage. Currently, it is making a profit of $24.5 million.Whale 2: It held a position worth $138 million and had a 10-times leverage. Currently, it is making a profit of $24.3 million.

item.title: Data: Ethereum Reserve Holdings and ETF Holdings Already Exceed 8% of Ethereum Total Supply
item.description: On August 13th, based on the data from strategicethreserve.xyz, the current Ethereum reserve held by the company and various ETH spot ETFs amounts to 2.95% and 5.13% of the total supply respectively. The total ratio now surpasses 8% of the overall Ethereum supply.

item.title: Binance Will Support Terra Luna Classic (LUNC) Network Upgrade
item.description: August 13th, according to official information, Binance is anticipated to halt the token deposit and withdrawal services for the Terra Luna Classic (LUNC) network at 22:30 (GMT+8) on August 15, 2025, in order to support its network upgrade.The project team will carry out the network upgrade at block height 24,660,000 (which is expected to be at 23:30 GMT+8 on August 15, 2025).

item.title: Kenyan Web3 Payment Platform HoneyCoin Raises $4.9 Million in Funding, Led by Flourish Ventures
item.description: On August 13th, according to BitKE, Kenya's Web3 payment platform HoneyCoin announced the completion of a $4.9 million financing round, with Flourish Ventures taking the lead. The funds will be utilized to expand operations, enhance product lines, and onboard senior executives. David Nandwa, the founder of HoneyCoin, established the company at the age of 19 in 2020. The monthly transaction volume of the platform has now exceeded $1.5 billion, serving 350 corporate clients and hundreds of thousands of users.HoneyCoin achieves instant or same-day settlement through a stablecoin-compatible platform and supports business in 45 countries. It has formed partnerships with institutions such as MoneyGram, UBA Bank, and Stripe. This financing round will assist in further expanding the team and ensuring regulatory compliance.

item.title: Norway's Sovereign Wealth Fund NBIM Increases Indirect Bitcoin Exposure, Current Exposure Reaches 7,161 BTC
item.description: On August 13th, based on K33 Research data, Norway's sovereign wealth fund NBIM, which has a total of $1.7 trillion in assets under management, raised its indirect Bitcoin exposure from 3,821 BTC at the end of 2024 to 7,161 BTC in 2025, representing a 192% increase. (Cointelegraph)
